results.title: Myopathy and possible intestinal dysfunction in a patient treated with colchicine and simvastatin.
results.text_hl: @DISEASE_Muscular_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D009135 @@@Myopathy@@@ and possible @<m>DISEASE_Intestinal_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007410 @@@intestinal dysfunction@@@ in a @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@ treated with @CHEMICAL_Colchicine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D003078 @@@colchicine@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@.

results.title: Simvastatin attenuates intestinal ischemia/reperfusion induced injury in rat.
results.text_hl: After 3 hours, the animals were sacrificed and serum and tissue obtained for biochemical and histological study. In the @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ treated group, @<m>DISEASE_Intestinal_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007410 @@@intestinal tissue injury@@@, @GENE_TNF @GENE_24835 @@@TNF-alpha@@@ level, and tissue malondealdehyde levels were significantly lower than in the I/R group (p < 0.05).

citations.NLM: Hajipour B, Somi MH, Saberifar F, Hemmati MR, Asl NA, Moein A, Vatankhah AM, Nourazar AR, Nasirizade MR. Simvastatin attenuates intestinal ischemia/reperfusion induced injury in rat. Folia Morphol (Warsz). 2009 Aug;68(3):156-62. PMID: 19722159

results.title: Effect of Simvastatin on the Intestinal Rho/ROCK Signaling Pathway in Rats With Sepsis.
results.text_hl: Staining with @CHEMICAL_Hematoxylin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D006416 @@@hematoxylin@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Acid_Red_87 @CHEMICAL_MESH:D004801 @@@eosin@@@ showed that severe @<m>DISEASE_Intestinal_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007410 @@@intestinal injury@@@ occurred in the @DISEASE_Sepsis @DISEASE_MESH:D018805 @@@sepsis@@@ group, which was reduced by the treatment of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@.

citations.NLM: Wang Y, Wang X, Yang W, Zhao X, Zhang R. Effect of Simvastatin on the Intestinal Rho/ROCK Signaling Pathway in Rats With Sepsis. J Surg Res. 2018 Dec;232():531-538. PMID: 30463769

results.title: Simvastatin-induced rhabdomyolysis in a patient with chronic renal failure.
results.text_hl: The commonest adverse effects of therapy with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ HMG CoA reductase inhibitors are @<m>DISEASE_Intestinal_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007410 @@@gastro-intestinal disturbance@@@, @DISEASE_Myositis @DISEASE_MESH:D009220 @@@myositis@@@ and @DISEASE_Muscular_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D009135 @@@myopathy@@@.

results.title: Simvastatin attenuates intestinal fibrosis independent of the anti-inflammatory effect by promoting fibroblast/myofibroblast apoptosis in the regeneration/healing process from TNBS-induced colitis.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ attenuates @<m>DISEASE_Intestinal_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007410 @@@intestinal fibrosis@@@ independent of the anti-@DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@inflammatory@@@ effect by promoting fibroblast/myofibroblast apoptosis in the regeneration/healing process from @CHEMICAL_Trinitrobenzenesulfonic_Acid @CHEMICAL_MESH:D014302 @@@TNBS@@@-induced @DISEASE_Colitis @DISEASE_MESH:D003092 @@@colitis@@@.

results.title: Simvastatin impairs smad-3 phosphorylation and modulates transforming growth factor beta1-mediated activation of intestinal fibroblasts.
results.text_hl: These findings offer a mechanism for the antifibrotic effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ and a therapeutic entry point in the treatment of @<m>DISEASE_Intestinal_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007410 @@@intestinal fibrosis@@@.

results.title: Statin pleiotropy prevents rho kinase-mediated intestinal epithelial barrier compromise induced by Blastocystis cysteine proteases.
results.text_hl: Our findings suggest that cysteine proteases of Mz(r) @SPECIES_12967 @@@Blastocystis@@@ induce ROCK-dependent disruption of intestinal epithelial barrier function and correlates with reorganization of cytoskeletal F-actin and tight junctional @GENE_TJP1 @GENE_7082 @@@ZO-1@@@. @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ prevented parasite-induced barrier-compromise, suggesting a therapeutic potential of statins in @<m>DISEASE_Intestinal_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007410 @@@intestinal infections@@@.

citations.NLM: Mirza H, Wu Z, Teo JD, Tan KS. Statin pleiotropy prevents rho kinase-mediated intestinal epithelial barrier compromise induced by Blastocystis cysteine proteases. Cell Microbiol. 2012 Sep;14(9):1474-84. PMID: 22587300
